coreAttributes.authorTag: There's a tag sewn into the inner lining which informs you that these stockings were made by 'Blooms'.
coreAttributes.name: toeless stocking
coreAttributes.description: A pair of nylon stockings, which reach up to the wearer's upper-thigh. The material around the toes and heel has been cut out, leaving the wearer's feet mostly exposed.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] on the stockings before pulling them all the way up to [npc.her] upper-thigh.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the stockings onto [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet], before pulling them all the way up to [npc2.her] upper-thigh.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the stockings onto [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet], before pulling them all the way up to [npc2.her] upper-thigh.
